definitions.definition: In an abrupt manner; without giving notice, or without the usual forms; suddenly; precipitously .
examples: The professor stopped her lecture abruptly when she noticed someone fall off their seat.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the late 16 century.

main_definition: In an abrupt manner; without giving notice, or without the usual forms; suddenly; precipitously . [First attested in the late 16 century.]
